trans-unit.source: Provides support for building a set of related custom designers.
trans-unit.target: 為建置一組相關的自訂設計工具提供支援。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner> interface derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface and provides support for flexibly navigating a hierarchy of related designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner>介面衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>介面，並提供以彈性的方式瀏覽相關的設計工具階層架構的支援。

trans-unit.source: With this interface, a programmer can supply a number of designers for the component, with the appropriate one being determined dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個介面，程式設計人員可以提供動態決定適當的一個元件的設計工具的數目。

trans-unit.source: This interface is a simple extension of its base class, adding just two properties for navigating a tree hierarchy: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner.Children%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner.Parent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面是其基底類別，加入了兩個屬性的導覽樹狀目錄階層的簡單擴充功能：<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner.Children%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner.Parent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For an overview of creating design components, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).
trans-unit.target: 如需建立設計元件的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of child designers.
trans-unit.target: 取得子設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />, containing the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner" /> child objects of the current designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，包含目前設計工具之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner" /> 子物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner.Children%2A> property will return an empty collection if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner> has no child objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner.Children%2A>屬性會傳回空集合，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner>沒有子物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner" /> representing the parent designer, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no parent.
trans-unit.target: 代表父設計工具的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner" />，如果沒有父代，則為 <see langword="null" />。
